51 namespace {
52 std::string rosNormalizeName(const std::string& name) {
53  std::string n;
54  n.reserve(name.size());
55 
56  // drop invalid initial chars
57  auto read = name.begin(), end = name.end();
58  while (read != end && !isalpha(*read) && *read != '/' && *read != '~')
59  ++read;
60 
61  // copy (and correct) remaining chars
62  while (read != end) {
63  char c = *read;
64  n.push_back((isalnum(c) || c == '_') ? c : '_');
65  ++read;
66  }
67  return n;
68 }
69 } // namespace

74 TaskPrivate::TaskPrivate(Task* me, const std::string& id)
75  : WrapperBasePrivate(me, std::string()), id_(rosNormalizeName(id)), preempt_requested_(false) {}
76 
77 void swap(StagePrivate*& lhs, StagePrivate*& rhs) {
78  // It only makes sense to swap pimpl instances of a Task!
79  // However, due to member protection rules, we can only implement it here
80  assert(typeid(lhs) == typeid(rhs));
81 
82  // swap instances
83  ::std::swap(lhs, rhs);
84  // as well as their me_ pointers
85  ::std::swap(lhs->me_, rhs->me_);
86 
87  // and redirect the parent pointers of children to new parents
88  auto& lhs_children = static_cast<ContainerBasePrivate*>(lhs)->children_;
89  for (auto it = lhs_children.begin(), end = lhs_children.end(); it != end; ++it) {
90  (*it)->pimpl()->unparent();
91  (*it)->pimpl()->setParent(static_cast<ContainerBase*>(lhs->me_));
92  (*it)->pimpl()->setParentPosition(it);
93  }
94 
95  auto& rhs_children = static_cast<ContainerBasePrivate*>(rhs)->children_;
96  for (auto it = rhs_children.begin(), end = rhs_children.end(); it != end; ++it) {
97  (*it)->pimpl()->unparent();
98  (*it)->pimpl()->setParent(static_cast<ContainerBase*>(rhs->me_));
99  (*it)->pimpl()->setParentPosition(it);
100  }
101 }
102 
103 const ContainerBase* TaskPrivate::stages() const {
104  return children().empty() ? nullptr : static_cast<ContainerBase*>(children().front().get());
105 }

107 Task::Task(const std::string& id, ContainerBase::pointer&& container)
108  : WrapperBase(new TaskPrivate(this, id), std::move(container)) {
109  if (!id.empty())
110  stages()->setName(id);
111 
112  // monitor state on commandline
113  // addTaskCallback(std::bind(&Task::printState, this, std::ref(std::cout)));
114  // enable introspection by default, but only if ros::init() was called
115  if (ros::isInitialized())
116  enableIntrospection(true);
117 }
118 
119 Task::Task(Task&& other) // NOLINT(performance-noexcept-move-constructor)
120  : WrapperBase(new TaskPrivate(this, std::string()), std::make_unique<SerialContainer>()) {
121  *this = std::move(other);
122 }
123 
124 Task& Task::operator=(Task&& other) { // NOLINT(performance-noexcept-move-constructor)
125  clear(); // remove all stages of current task
126  swap(this->pimpl_, other.pimpl_);
127  return *this;
128 }

130 struct PlannerCache
131 {
132  typedef std::tuple<std::string, std::string, std::string> PlannerID;
133  using PlannerMap = std::map<PlannerID, std::weak_ptr<planning_pipeline::PlanningPipeline> >;
134  using ModelList = std::list<std::pair<std::weak_ptr<const robot_model::RobotModel>, PlannerMap> >;
135  ModelList cache_;
136 
137  PlannerMap::mapped_type& retrieve(const robot_model::RobotModelConstPtr& model, const PlannerID& id) {
138  // find model in cache_ and remove expired entries while doing so
139  ModelList::iterator model_it = cache_.begin();
140  while (model_it != cache_.end()) {
141  if (model_it->first.expired()) {
142  model_it = cache_.erase(model_it);
143  continue;
144  }
145  if (model_it->first.lock() == model)
146  break;
147  ++model_it;
148  }
149  if (model_it == cache_.end()) // if not found, create a new PlannerMap for this model
150  model_it = cache_.insert(cache_.begin(), std::make_pair(model, PlannerMap()));
151 
152  return model_it->second.insert(std::make_pair(id, PlannerMap::mapped_type())).first->second;
153  }
154 };
155 
156 planning_pipeline::PlanningPipelinePtr Task::createPlanner(const robot_model::RobotModelConstPtr& model,
157  const std::string& ns,
158  const std::string& planning_plugin_param_name,
159  const std::string& adapter_plugins_param_name) {
160  static PlannerCache cache;
161  PlannerCache::PlannerID id(ns, planning_plugin_param_name, adapter_plugins_param_name);
162 
163  std::weak_ptr<planning_pipeline::PlanningPipeline>& entry = cache.retrieve(model, id);
164  planning_pipeline::PlanningPipelinePtr planner = entry.lock();
165  if (!planner) {
166  // create new entry
167  planner = std::make_shared<planning_pipeline::PlanningPipeline>(
168  model, ros::NodeHandle(ns), planning_plugin_param_name, adapter_plugins_param_name);
169  // store in cache
170  entry = planner;
171  }
172  return planner;
173 }
174 
175 Task::~Task() {
176  auto impl = pimpl();
177  clear(); // remove all stages
178  impl->robot_model_.reset();
179  // only destroy loader after all references to the model are gone!
180  impl->robot_model_loader_.reset();
181 }
182 
183 void Task::setRobotModel(const core::RobotModelConstPtr& robot_model) {
184  if (!robot_model) {
185  ROS_ERROR_STREAM(name() << ": received invalid robot model");
186  return;
187  }
188  auto impl = pimpl();
189  if (impl->robot_model_ && impl->robot_model_ != robot_model)
190  reset(); // solutions, scenes, etc become invalid
191  impl->robot_model_ = robot_model;
192 }
193 
194 void Task::loadRobotModel(const std::string& robot_description) {
195  auto impl = pimpl();
196  impl->robot_model_loader_ = std::make_shared<robot_model_loader::RobotModelLoader>(robot_description);
197  setRobotModel(impl->robot_model_loader_->getModel());
198  if (!impl->robot_model_)
199  throw Exception("Task failed to construct RobotModel");
200 }

203  stages()->add(std::move(stage));
204 }

206 bool Task::insert(Stage::pointer&& stage, int before) {
207  return stages()->insert(std::move(stage), before);
208 }
209 
210 void Task::clear() {
211  reset();
212  stages()->clear();
213 }
214 
215 void Task::enableIntrospection(bool enable) {
216  auto impl = pimpl();
217  if (enable && !impl->introspection_)
218  impl->introspection_.reset(new Introspection(impl));
219  else if (!enable && impl->introspection_) {
220  // reset introspection instance of all stages
221  pimpl()->setIntrospection(nullptr);
222  pimpl()->traverseStages(
223  [](Stage& stage, int /*depth*/) {
224  stage.pimpl()->setIntrospection(nullptr);
225  return true;
226  },
227  1, UINT_MAX);
228  impl->introspection_.reset();
229  }
230 }
231 
232 Introspection& Task::introspection() {
233  auto impl = pimpl();
234  enableIntrospection(true);
235  return *impl->introspection_;
236 }
237 
238 Task::TaskCallbackList::const_iterator Task::addTaskCallback(TaskCallback&& cb) {
239  auto impl = pimpl();
240  impl->task_cbs_.emplace_back(std::move(cb));
241  return --(impl->task_cbs_.cend());
242 }
243 
244 void Task::eraseTaskCallback(TaskCallbackList::const_iterator which) {
245  pimpl()->task_cbs_.erase(which);
246 }
247 
248 void Task::reset() {
249  auto impl = pimpl();
250  // signal introspection, that this task was reset
251  if (impl->introspection_)
252  impl->introspection_->reset();
253 
254  WrapperBase::reset();
255 }
256 
257 void Task::init() {
258  auto impl = pimpl();
259  if (!impl->robot_model_)
260  loadRobotModel();
261 
262  // initialize push connections of wrapped child
263  StagePrivate* child = wrapped()->pimpl();
264  child->setPrevEnds(impl->pendingBackward());
265  child->setNextStarts(impl->pendingForward());
266 
267  // and *afterwards* initialize all children recursively
268  stages()->init(impl->robot_model_);
269  // task expects its wrapped child to push to both ends, this triggers interface resolution
270  stages()->pimpl()->resolveInterface(InterfaceFlags({ GENERATE }));
271 
272  // provide introspection instance to all stages
273  impl->setIntrospection(impl->introspection_.get());
274  impl->traverseStages(
275  [impl](Stage& stage, int /*depth*/) {
276  stage.pimpl()->setIntrospection(impl->introspection_.get());
277  return true;
278  },
279  1, UINT_MAX);
280 
281  // first time publish task
282  if (impl->introspection_)
283  impl->introspection_->publishTaskDescription();
284 }
285 
286 bool Task::canCompute() const {
287  return stages()->canCompute();
288 }
289 
290 void Task::compute() {
291  stages()->pimpl()->runCompute();
292 }
293 
294 bool Task::plan(size_t max_solutions) {
295  auto impl = pimpl();
296  init();
297 
298  impl->preempt_requested_ = false;
299  while (ros::ok() && !impl->preempt_requested_ && canCompute() &&
300  (max_solutions == 0 || numSolutions() < max_solutions)) {
301  compute();
302  for (const auto& cb : impl->task_cbs_)
303  cb(*this);
304  if (impl->introspection_)
305  impl->introspection_->publishTaskState();
306  }
307  printState();
308  return numSolutions() > 0;
309 }
310 
311 void Task::preempt() {
312  pimpl()->preempt_requested_ = true;
313 }
314 
315 moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes Task::execute(const SolutionBase& s) {
316  actionlib::SimpleActionClient<moveit_task_constructor_msgs::ExecuteTaskSolutionAction> ac("execute_task_solution");
317  ac.waitForServer();
318 
319  moveit_task_constructor_msgs::ExecuteTaskSolutionGoal goal;
320  s.fillMessage(goal.solution, pimpl()->introspection_.get());
321  s.start()->scene()->getPlanningSceneMsg(goal.solution.start_scene);
322 
323  ac.sendGoal(goal);
324  ac.waitForResult();
325  return ac.getResult()->error_code;
326 }
327 
328 void Task::publishAllSolutions(bool wait) {
329  enableIntrospection(true);
330  pimpl()->introspection_->publishAllSolutions(wait);
331 }
332 
333 void Task::onNewSolution(const SolutionBase& s) {
334  // no need to call WrapperBase::onNewSolution!
335  auto impl = pimpl();
336  for (const auto& cb : impl->solution_cbs_)
337  cb(s);
338 }

340 ContainerBase* Task::stages() {
341  return static_cast<ContainerBase*>(WrapperBase::wrapped());
342 }

344 const ContainerBase* Task::stages() const {
